scripts.deploy: bash -c "set -o allexport; source ./.env.custom; source .env; set +o allexport && dfx deploy"
scripts.deploy:ic: bash -c "set -o allexport; source ./env.ci; set +o allexport && dfx deploy --ic"
scripts.upgrade: bash -c "set -o allexport; source ./.env.custom; source .env; set +o allexport && dfx build entity_manager && dfx canister install --mode upgrade entity_manager"
scripts.upgrade:ic: bash -c "set -o allexport; source ./.env.custom; source .env; set +o allexport && dfx build entity_manager --ic && dfx canister install --mode upgrade entity_manager --ic"
scripts.reinstall: bash -c "set -o allexport; source ./.env.custom; source .env; set +o allexport && dfx build entity_manager && dfx canister install --mode reinstall entity_manager"
scripts.reinstall:ic: bash -c "set -o allexport; source ./.env.custom; source .env; set +o allexport && dfx build entity_manager --ic && dfx canister install --mode reinstall entity_manager --ic"
scripts.generate: bash -c "set -o allexport; source ./.env.custom; source .env; set +o allexport && dfx generate"
